sentences: Pete grew up on the north west side of Chicago.
His mother is a Chicago police officer.
Pete started playing guitar and bass guitar at the age of 12 years.
He was part of the original line-up of the Methadones, which started in 1993.
In 2003 Pete joined The Bomb, the side-project band for Naked Raygun lead vocalist Jeff Pezzati.
In 2011 Pete was invited to fill in on bass for a convalescing Pierre Kezdy of Naked Raygun.
He left Naked Raygun in June 2014.
